Reviews.Title: “One Word- CLEAN”
Reviews.Author: KlasikLadyBug
Reviews.Content: cleanest motel stayed towels sheets bedspreads location rates view ocean floor downside desk clerk glass window stand shine check couldnt talking werent able wifi outside drive street restaurant free coffee consisted 2 packets 4cup coffee maker six night stay buy coffee grocer spent time sightseeing didnt request maid service daily basis 3rd day maid service bit disappointed sheets werent changed sand bed real complaint lack notice painters entire week morning woke front sprayed 7am hurried 8 painters painting outside walls stair railing night painters painting walkways steps actually painting guests bottom floor difficult leave roomswe returned late evening tired rest dinner painter painting walkway sitting front annoyed returned left sat street finished appreciated notice workers schedule paint world difference motel look floors hard thin laminate cleaner carpet doubt stay rates cant beat wouldnt consider motel kid friendly play parking lot doesnt cell phone days pool ocean street walls little thin dont noises dont mind neighbors hearing learned hate snooze button alarm clock neighbor didnt embarrassing facing neighbor hes passionate night

Reviews.Title: “Get a room, enjoy the beach and stop whining!”
Reviews.Author: Jeffry R
Reviews.Content: arrived daytona mid november reservation tried finding studios line checked acceptable nice hotel overpriced november 100 night nicely painted yellow building stopped strip motel charmingly redone bit austere price complaints phone pool pets clean laminate floors choice bed linens mattresses clean nice table chairs outside patio hotel cooking stuff own food save bucks sized fridge public beach access street blast neighbors spotless homes lightbulbs replaced day thanks stay

Reviews.Title: “The Best - always go back”
Reviews.Author: Romeopumpkin
Reviews.Content: mom pop motel looked stayed ones dont stay else stay bike week biketoberfest summer vacations etc call convenient forget 711 door love wood floors improve getting beds process doing bathrooms little updating due time love manager nice accommodating cleaning staff nice accommodating couldnt sit front watch people sit private porches party absolutely love recommend friends

Reviews.Content: ive stayed times clean location middle a1a wanna eat 711 door plan driving couple miles restaurants nearby closed plus extremely clean except hole shower curtain hardwood floors dingy carpet
